description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
   
   Enhancements 
   DIAGRAMNET-51295-VSDX to SVG - the low quality of output SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51298-SVGSaveOptions - add support to control the level of bitmap compression
   DIAGRAMNET-51300-Add support of connecting shapes with connection index
     
    Bugs  

   DIAGRAMNET-50577-VSDX to PDF conversion, the circular shape's text is misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50582-VSDX to HTML conversion, the circular shape's text is misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50601-VSDX to PDF conversion, the circular shape's text is misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50606-VSDX to HTML conversion, the circular shape's text is misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-51197-Warning triangle shapes are not rendered correctly on saving VSDM to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51245-Displaced text items on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51246-Incorrect fonts applied to text when converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51296-VSDM to SVG - the image is truncated
   DIAGRAMNET-51301-VSDX to PDF - the color of text on connecting lines is changed
   DIAGRAMNET-51302-VSDX to PDF - missing graphic elements
   DIAGRAMNET-51304-VSDX to PDF - incomplete rendering of the flow chart
   DIAGRAMNET-51305-VSDX to PDF - missing graphic elements  
   DIAGRAMNET-51306-VSDX to PDF - the color of text on connecting lines is changed
   DIAGRAMNET-51307-VSDX to PDF - missing graphic elements
   DIAGRAMNET-51313-Open and save routine of a VSDX drawing generates a corrupt output file
   DIAGRAMNET-51314-VSDX to SVG - incorrect positioning of the text
   DIAGRAMNET-51317-VSDX to PDF - the text of connecting lines is missing
   DIAGRAMNET-51318-VSDX to PDF - the bold formatted text of rectangle shapes is missing
   DIAGRAMNET-51319-VSDM to SVG - the arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow error
   DIAGRAMNET-51320-Error in the element of shape while loading a VSDM
   DIAGRAMNET-51323-VSDM to SVG - all connecting lines are missing
   DIAGRAMNET-51324-VSDM to SVG - incorrect border style and border color of various shapes
   DIAGRAMNET-51326-Issue after adding two comments to the shape
   DIAGRAMNET-51327-Issue after using the "AddComment" method when adding comments to various shapes.
   DIAGRAMNET-51328-Aspose Diagram incorrectly imports shape to document
   DIAGRAMNET-51330-VSDM to SVG - an additional watermark text is added
   DIAGRAMNET-51332-VSDM to SVG - incorrect rendering of an icon
   DIAGRAMNET-51334-VSDM to SVG - displaced text at the top right corner
   DIAGRAMNET-51335-VSDM to SVG - incorrect rendering of the background image
   DIAGRAMNET-51337-VSD to HTML - invalid format of the input string error
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
